Cell.Data: The DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES column contains info on what text between { } signs means (if applicable). It usually stands for either a numeric value, or a numeric value with an icon. Text between [ ] signs stands for a certain type of icon.

The Vanguard Representative presents the following request:[br/][br/]"As part of their rebuilding efforts, the Vanguard Delegation ask for the production of pre-fabricated housing packages. Once you have conquered the planet, they can be rolled out for use in small-scale settlements."[br/][br/][recommendedcol]Tip: Declining empire requests does not reduce Empire Favor, diplomatic relations, or reputation.[/recommendedcol]
先锋代表提出以下请求：[br/][br/]“作为重建工作的一部分，先锋代表团要求生产预制房屋套件。一旦你征服了这个星球，我们就可以将这些零件用于小型定居点了。”[br/][br/][recommendedcol]提示：拒绝帝国请求并不会减少帝国好感度、外交关系或声望。[/recommendedcol]
The Vanguard send their regards, and would like to say that "This humanitarian action is greatly appreciated".
先锋送来问候，并表示“十分感激这一人道主义行为”。
For references to game terminology and in-world references, please check the glossary delivered as part of the documentation.
The delegation left, clearly disappointed, despite them saying that "It is okay".
虽然代表团嘴上说着“没关系”，但他们在离开时显然十分失望。

In the text below, text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Kill the assigned group of enemies

The Vanguard Representative presents the following request:[br/][br/]"Having finally pinpointed the ideal location for settlement on this planet, the Vanguard Delegation demands that we clear the site of wild animals so that "our people can peacefully resettle" once the planet has been conquered."[br/][br/][recommendedcol]Tip: Declining empire requests does not reduce Empire Favor, diplomatic relations, or reputation.[/recommendedcol]
先锋代表提出以下请求：[br/][br/]“在最终确定了这个星球上的理想定居地点后，先锋代表团要求我们清理那里的野生动物。这样一来，等这个星球被征服后，‘我们的人民就可以安居乐业了’。”[br/][br/][recommendedcol]提示：拒绝帝国请求并不会减少帝国好感度、外交关系或声望。[/recommendedcol]
They almost forgot to send their thanks when rushing out of the observation room to start preparations.
他们在冲出观察室并开始准备工作时，几乎忘记了感谢。
One of the Vanguard delegation had to be removed from the room for near treasonous language. Needless to say, they are displeased with this course of action.
一位先锋代表因为说出了近乎反叛的言辞而被赶出了大厅。毫无疑问，他们对这一行动方案很不满意。
Claim the specified sector for one of your colonies
为你的一个殖民地占领特定区域

The Vanguard Representative presents the following request:[br/][br/]"Constant expansion into new sectors for the territory of a colony increases its effectiveness and prestige. The Vanguard recommend you capture the specified sector and add it to one of your colonies."[br/][br/][recommendedcol]Tip: Declining empire requests does not reduce Empire Favor, diplomatic relations, or reputation.[/recommendedcol]
先锋代表提出以下请求：[br/][br/]“殖民地的不断扩张可以提升殖民地的效率与威望。先锋建议你占领一片指定区域，并将其连接至你的一个殖民地。”[br/][br/][recommendedcol]提示：拒绝帝国请求并不会减少帝国好感度、外交关系或声望。[/recommendedcol]
The Vanguard send their regards: "A fine addition to your colony. No doubt this will strengthen your position on the planet."
先锋发来问候：“那对你的殖民地来说是一次很好的扩张。毫无疑问，这将巩固你在这个星球上的地位。”
The Vanguard delegation relays: "A shame, really. It is only a matter of time before one of your enemies captures it."
先锋代表团转述称：“真是遗憾。你的敌人早晚会占领那里，只是时间的问题罢了。”
Quartz refers to the race of enemies.
Kill the assigned group of enemies and the spawner they guard
击杀指定敌人群体及其守卫的出生点

A Dvar Consortium ambassador presents the following request:[br/][br/]"Quartzite vermin close to your position are tunneling below the surface and eating all the precious metals we were hoping to extract later! Go to their nest and make sure they leave!"[br/][br/][recommendedcol]Tip: Declining empire requests does not reduce Empire Favor, diplomatic relations, or reputation.[/recommendedcol]
一名矮人财团大使提出以下请求：[br/][br/]“你所在位置附近的石英岩兽害虫正在地下挖掘隧道并吞食我们打算开采的宝贵金属！找到它们的巢穴，让它们滚得越远越好！”[br/][br/][recommendedcol]提示：拒绝帝国请求并不会减少帝国好感度、外交关系或声望。[/recommendedcol]
Dvar refers to the race. Consortium refers to a group of Dvar. Quartzite refers to the race of enemies.
It appears the Dvar are pleased: "Your quick actions have ensured we can extract precious materials once the planet is conquered."
矮人似乎很高兴：“你的迅速行动保住了珍贵的金属资源，等这个星球被征服后，我们就可以立刻投身开采了。”
The Consortium leader looked rather displeased, though it may be better not to repeat their words.
财团领导人看起来相当不高兴，不过最好还是不要重复他们的话。

A Dvar Consortium ambassador presents the following request:[br/][br/]"We would like you to use the unique mix of minerals and chemicals present on the planet you are currently colonizing to create a shipment of explosives for us. According to our readings, they would be especially good for use in mining."[br/][br/][recommendedcol]Tip: Declining empire requests does not reduce Empire Favor, diplomatic relations, or reputation.[/recommendedcol]
一名矮人财团大使提出以下请求：[br/][br/]“我们希望你能利用当前殖民星球上的某些矿物和化学物质调配一种独特的混合炸药，并为我们运送过来。根据我们的读数，这些炸药将特别适合采矿作业。”[br/][br/][recommendedcol]提示：拒绝帝国请求并不会减少帝国好感度、外交关系或声望。[/recommendedcol]
The shipment has been received and a message has been relayed that the ambassador is pleased with the results.
货物已送达并收到一条消息，矮人大使对结果非常满意。
The order has been cancelled and the ambassador has clearly communicated his disapproval.
订单已取消，矮人大使对此明确表示不满。
Kill the assigned group of enemies and the spawner they guard
击杀指定敌人群体及其守卫的出生点

A Kir'Ko Hive Representative has come to us with the following request:[br/][br/]"Those that enslaved us for so long, those you call Paragon, are down on that planet. Please destroy them and their home. Do not leave a trace of their existence on the planet's surface."[br/][br/][recommendedcol]Tip: Declining empire requests does not reduce Empire Favor, diplomatic relations, or reputation.[/recommendedcol]
一位奇尔寇蜂巢代表找到我们并提出以下请求：[br/][br/]“那些长期奴役我们并被你们称为完人的家伙已在那个星球着陆。请消灭他们，并摧毁他们的家园，抹去一切他们曾经存在过的痕迹。”[br/][br/][recommendedcol]提示：拒绝帝国请求并不会减少帝国好感度、外交关系或声望。[/recommendedcol]
Kir'Ko refers to the race. Paragon refers to the NPC faction
Kir'Ko expressions are hard to read, but the representative appeared pleased.
虽然奇尔寇的表情难以辨认，但那位代表似乎很高兴。
Kir'Ko expressions are hard to read, but the representative appeared rather distraught.
虽然奇尔寇的表情难以辨认，但那位代表似乎很是恼怒。

A Kir'Ko Hive Representative has come to us with the following request:[br/][br/]"According to the reading provided by our researchers this planet may possess what we call "psionic ley lines". We request a team of researchers be put on reviewing the signs necessary to qualify this planet as such."[br/][br/][recommendedcol]Tip: Declining empire requests does not reduce Empire Favor, diplomatic relations, or reputation.[/recommendedcol]
一位奇尔寇蜂巢代表找到我们并提出以下请求：[br/][br/]“根据我们的研究人员提供的读数，这个星球可能存在所谓的‘灵能地脉’。我们需要一组研究人员调查一些必要的迹象来确定这个情况是否属实。”[br/][br/][recommendedcol]提示：拒绝帝国请求并不会减少帝国好感度、外交关系或声望。[/recommendedcol]
The Representative appears satisfied with the results and will take a personal look at them.
那名代表似乎对结果非常满意，并将亲自去查看地脉。
The Kir'Ko Hive Representative's excitement vanished quickly after learning their request has gone unfulfilled.
奇尔寇蜂巢代表在得知自己的请求没有得到满足后，那股兴奋之情很快就消失了。
将殖民地发展至 {pop}[population/] 人口

A Kir'Ko Hive Representative has come to us with the following request:[br/][br/]"Continual growth is important to us. We would like you to show the processes you employ to grow one of your colonies to a properly functioning hive."[br/][br/][recommendedcol]Tip: Declining empire requests does not reduce Empire Favor, diplomatic relations, or reputation.[/recommendedcol]
一位奇尔寇蜂巢代表找到我们并提出以下请求：[br/][br/]“持续增长对我们十分重要，我们希望你能展示一下把殖民地发展成为功能更加完善的蜂巢的过程。”[br/][br/][recommendedcol]提示：拒绝帝国请求并不会减少帝国好感度、外交关系或声望。[/recommendedcol]
The Representative has been taking notes for a while now. With a nod and a 'thank you', it appears that their request is fulfilled.
那名代表做了一段时间的记录，然后点头并说了声“谢谢”。他的要求似乎得到了满足。
"Even if your hive did not reach its target, I have gathered much useful information."
“虽然你的蜂巢并没有达成目标，但我已经收集了很多有用的信息。”

An Assembly Ambassador has put forward a request:[br/][br/]"To go fully artificial is a dream shared by many Assembly, but uploading one's conciousness has never worked. An Assembly research team request a second opinion on the viability of a new "Simulated Brain" that may be the answer to this dream."[br/][br/][recommendedcol]Tip: Declining empire requests does not reduce Empire Favor, diplomatic relations, or reputation.[/recommendedcol]
一位半机械人大使提出请求：[br/][br/]“完全走向人工化是许多半机械人的梦想，但我们上传人脑意识的尝试始终未能成功。一个半机械人研究小组要求对一种新的‘模拟大脑’的可行性征求补充意见，这可能就是这个梦想的答案。”[br/][br/][recommendedcol]提示：拒绝帝国请求并不会减少帝国好感度、外交关系或声望。[/recommendedcol]
Disproving their Simulated Brain project was disappointing, but mostly the Ambassador was thankful for the effort made by your scientists.
虽然反驳半机械人的模拟大脑计划令他们感到失望，但大使还是对你的科学家所做的努力表示感谢。
The Ambassador expressed that they feel like they are not taken seriously and will take their request elsewhere.
大使表示，他们觉得自己没有受到重视，并且会向其他人提出这个请求。
Kill the assigned group of enemies

An Assembly Ambassador has put forward a request:[br/][br/]To take out a group of mechanicals that are planning to deploy a series of signal jamming beacons that would greatly disrupt their communications network.[br/][br/][recommendedcol]Tip: Declining empire requests does not reduce Empire Favor, diplomatic relations, or reputation.[/recommendedcol]
一位半机械人大使提出请求：[br/][br/]干掉一群正在打算部署信号干扰信标的机械，这些信标将严重破坏他们的通信网络。[br/][br/][recommendedcol]提示：拒绝帝国请求并不会减少帝国好感度、外交关系或声望。[/recommendedcol]
Your execution of the requested enemies was met with approval.
你处决了他们的敌人，并因此获得了认可。
The Assembly request going unfilfilled has made for noises of disapproval.
半机械人的要求未得到满足，因而引发了反对的声音。
Absorb a new Colony or Outpost
吸收一个新的殖民地或前哨

An Assembly ambassador has put forward a request:[br/][br/]"To learn even more about the peoples of this galaxy, we must assimilate more. We require you to adopt a new colony into your empire by any means necessary."[br/][br/][recommendedcol]Tip: Declining empire requests does not reduce Empire Favor, diplomatic relations, or reputation.[/recommendedcol]
一位半机械人大使提出请求：[br/][br/]“为了更好地了解这个星系的居民，我们必须进一步将他们同化。我们需要你采取任何必要的手段，将新的殖民地吞并至你的帝国。”[br/][br/][recommendedcol]提示：拒绝帝国请求并不会减少帝国好感度、外交关系或声望。[/recommendedcol]
The Assembly Ambassador appears pleased with responses such as "interesting" and "adequate".
半机械人大使似乎很满意，答复的言语中满是“有趣”和“满意”之类的字眼。
The lack of interest in their request has left the Assembly ambassador scheming to study folks through more... deliberate means.
由于你对半机械人的请求缺乏兴趣，那名大使计划通过更加……谨慎的手段来研究这里的居民。

We have caught wind of a marriage between two Syndicate houses. It would make them look favorably upon your rule as emperor if we were to send them an appropriate gift for their wedding. Production plans for a lavish gift are ready.[br/][br/][recommendedcol]Tip: Declining empire requests does not reduce Empire Favor, diplomatic relations, or reputation.[/recommendedcol]
我们听说有两个辛迪加家族即将联姻。如果我们为婚礼送去一件合适的礼物，他们肯定会对你身为帝皇的统治产生好感。一份奢华礼物的生产计划已经准备就绪。[br/][br/][recommendedcol]提示：拒绝帝国请求并不会减少帝国好感度、外交关系或声望。[/recommendedcol]
The gift has been well received, and the two houses look favorably upon us.
他们愉快地收下了礼物，两个家族的成员都很喜欢我们。
Perhaps silence is the best answer. We will ignore their special occasion for now.
也许沉默是最好的答案，我们将暂不考虑他们的特殊活动。
Kill the assigned group of enemies and the spawner they guard
击杀指定敌人群体及其守卫的出生点

A Syndicate House Representative has come to us with a request:[br/][br/]"Would you aid us in repaying a... 'debt' of sorts? A defector not only escaped one of our worlds but also stole precious material, and killed dozens of our people in the process. They are hiding down on the planet and have proven to be very dangerous indeed."[br/][br/][recommendedcol]Tip: Declining empire requests does not reduce Empire Favor, diplomatic relations, or reputation.[/recommendedcol]
一位辛迪加家族代表找到我们并提出请求：[br/][br/]“你能帮助我们讨回各种……‘债务’吗？有一帮叛徒不仅逃出了星球，还偷走了我们宝贵的材料，并在这个过程中杀害了几十个人。他们现在就藏在这个星球上，事实证明他们非常危险。”[br/][br/][recommendedcol]提示：拒绝帝国请求并不会减少帝国好感度、外交关系或声望。[/recommendedcol]
The Syndicate write: "We are pleased with the results and are in your debt."
辛迪加人发来消息：“我们对结果感到很满意，现在我们欠你一笔债务了。”
We have yet to receive a response from the Syndicate representative, but can assume they are rather displeased.
我们没有收到辛迪加代表的答复，但我们猜测他们应该相当不满。
Use Strategic Operations on the specified Colony Cores
对指定殖民地核心使用战略行动
Strategic Operations and Colony Core refer to in game concepts

A Syndicate House Representative has come to us with a request:[br/][br/]"We would like to see your ability to perform complicated strategic operations in action. Perhaps a demonstration would be in order? We have chosen the targets - the operation is up to you." [br/][br/][recommendedcol]Tip: Declining empire requests does not reduce Empire Favor, diplomatic relations, or reputation.[/recommendedcol]
一位辛迪加家族代表找到我们并提出请求：[br/][br/]“我们希望看到你有能力开展复杂的战略行动，或许你可以做个示范？我们已经选好了目标，具体行动由你自己决定。”[br/][br/][recommendedcol]提示：拒绝帝国请求并不会减少帝国好感度、外交关系或声望。[/recommendedcol]
To say the Representative was enthusiastic would be an overstatement, but he seemed pleased nonetheless.
如果要说那名代表十分兴奋的话是有些夸大事实，但他确实很高兴。
A chuckle escaped the Representative and he could be seen shaking his head as he left the room.
那位代表发出一阵轻笑，并在离开房间时摇了摇头。

The Amazon Ambassador has brought a request before us:[br/][br/]"We would like a survey of the local wildlife. We are absolutely certain this planet contains species we have not seen before."[br/][br/][recommendedcol]Tip: Declining empire requests does not reduce Empire Favor, diplomatic relations, or reputation.[/recommendedcol]
一位亚马逊大使找到我们并提出请求：[br/][br/]“我们想调查一下当地的野生动物，我们确信这个星球上存在着我们以前从未见过的物种。”[br/][br/][recommendedcol]提示：拒绝帝国请求并不会减少帝国好感度、外交关系或声望。[/recommendedcol]
The Ambassador expressed her appreciation for the thoroughness of our researchers.
亚马逊大使对我们研究人员工作时的缜密和彻底精神表示赞赏。
The Ambassador vocally disapproved of the lack of interest in her request.
那名大使直言不讳地对我们的冷漠表示不悦。
Kill the assigned group of enemies

The Amazon Ambassador has brought a request before us:[br/][br/]"Our intelligence suggests that a pack of feral wildlife is being led by a rather dominant alpha creature. According to this information, their strength may spiral out of control very quickly if left alone. We request you to take care of these creatures before they create an irreparable imbalance in the local fauna."[br/][br/][recommendedcol]Tip: Declining empire requests does not reduce Empire Favor, diplomatic relations, or reputation.[/recommendedcol]
一位亚马逊大使向我们提出请求：[br/][br/]“我们的情报表明，一群狂暴的野生动物正由一个首领生物所领导。如果任其发展下去，它们的力量可能很快便会失去控制。我们希望你能解决掉这些生物，以免它们给当地动物种群带来无法弥补的失衡。”[br/][br/][recommendedcol]提示：拒绝帝国请求并不会减少帝国好感度、外交关系或声望。[/recommendedcol]
The Amazon Ambassador sends her regards. "It is a shame we could not save those animals, but it is for the best."
那名亚马逊大使发来问候：“很遗憾我们不能拯救那些动物，但这是最好的办法。”
The Amazon Ambassador expressed her worry, saying they cannot possibly predict the consequences of this.
那名亚马逊大使表达了她的担忧，称她们无法预测这件事情的后果。

The Amazon Ambassador has brought a request before us:[br/][br/]"The many natural wonders of this planet continue to intrigue us. In order to truly understand this ecosystem, we must set sail to explore the nautical habitats. A scout to these locations would help us immensely."[br/][br/][recommendedcol]Tip: Declining empire requests does not reduce Empire Favor, diplomatic relations, or reputation.[/recommendedcol]
一位亚马逊大使向我们提出请求：[br/][br/]“这个星球上的许多自然奇观不断引起我们的兴趣。为了真正了解这一生态系统，我们必须扬帆出海，探索这片海上栖息地。如果你能侦察一下这些地方，将会对我们很有帮助。”[br/][br/][recommendedcol]提示：拒绝帝国请求并不会减少帝国好感度、外交关系或声望。[/recommendedcol]
The normally stoic Amazon Ambassador appeared much more relaxed at your willingness to implement their request, and expressed their thanks.
见你愿意实现她们的要求，这位一贯坚忍克己的亚马逊大使显得轻松许多，并表达了她们的感谢。
"We expected as much" was the only response given by the Amazon ambassador.
“这是我们料想中的结果。”那位亚马逊大使只给出了这一句回应。
Kill the assigned group of enemies

The Shakarn Domok Generals demand the following:[br/][br/]For you to prove your strength to them, so they can judge if you are worth following. Take out a target they have deemed "strong". The hulking reptillians were really quite adamant, saying they weren't quite sure if you are "Worthy of the Scarlet Scepter".[br/][br/][recommendedcol]Tip: Declining empire requests does not reduce Empire Favor, diplomatic relations, or reputation.[/recommendedcol]
一名多摩克氏族的蜥蜴人将军提出以下需求：[br/][br/]向他们证明你的实力，干掉一个他们认为“很强大”的目标，从而让他们判断你是否值得追随。这些身材魁梧的爬行动物十分固执，他们不确定你是否“配得上绯红节杖”。[br/][br/][recommendedcol]提示：拒绝帝国请求并不会减少帝国好感度、外交关系或声望。[/recommendedcol]
Shakarn refers to the race. Domok refers to a caste of Shakarn. Scarlet Scepter refers to their lore.
Begrudgingly they agreed that you have shown strength. Their secretary assuringly said this is their way of saying they are impressed.
蜥蜴人勉强认同了你展现出的实力，他们的秘书拍着胸脯保证称，这是他们表示刮目相看的说法。
"You are weak! The Scarlet Scepter will not be passed down to you!"
“软弱之辈！绯红节杖是不会传给你的！”
Kill the assigned group of enemies and the spawner they guard
击杀指定敌人群体及其守卫的出生点

The Shakarn Domok Generals demand the following:[br/][br/]"Mutant pirates have stolen a number of Zardas and Domok eggs, and fled to this planet. We want to see them killed and burned. Take these pirates out, and return our stolen eggs to us!"[br/][br/][recommendedcol]Tip: Declining empire requests does not reduce Empire Favor, diplomatic relations, or reputation.[/recommendedcol]
一名多摩克氏族的蜥蜴人将军提出以下需求：[br/][br/]“变异海盗偷走了许多扎尔达斯和多摩克氏族的蜥蜴蛋，并逃到了这个星球。我们希望看到他们彻底死透，然后烧成灰烬。干掉那些海盗，把我们失窃的蛋还给我们！”[br/][br/][recommendedcol]提示：拒绝帝国请求并不会减少帝国好感度、外交关系或声望。[/recommendedcol]
"We thank you for returning our spawn to us safely." The Shakarn send their regards.
“谢谢你把我们的蛋平安送回。”蜥蜴人发来问候。
"No! You let them escape with our spawn!" The Shakarn are rather unhappy with this turn of events.
“不！你竟然让他们带着我们的蛋逃走了！”蜥蜴人对事态的转变相当不满。

The Shakarn Zardas General request the following:[br/][br/]"We are very curious to observe the tactics you employ to truly annihilate your enemies. We have chosen a target for you to burn to the ground."[br/][br/][recommendedcol]Tip: Declining empire requests does not reduce Empire Favor, diplomatic relations, or reputation.[/recommendedcol]
一名扎尔达斯氏族的蜥蜴人将军提出以下需求：[br/][br/]“我们对你消灭敌人的战术十分好奇。我们已经为你选好了目标，由你来将那里化为灰烬。”[br/][br/][recommendedcol]提示：拒绝帝国请求并不会减少帝国好感度、外交关系或声望。[/recommendedcol]
Zardas refers to a caste of Shakarn
The Zardas General tells us that they find this information "interesting" and they look forward to "seeing you defeat your opposition."
那名扎尔达斯将军告诉我们称，蜥蜴人觉得这一消息“很有趣”，他们十分期待“见证你打败对手”。
It appears the Zardas General is not entirely pleased with your decision to ignore their request.
你无视了那名扎尔达斯将军的请求，他们看起来不太满意。
Kill the assigned group of enemies

An Oathbound Seer comes to us with a request:[br/][br/]"Intelligence suggests that oathbreakers have been located on this planet. For the good of all we offer you this quest: kill them and spread their remains so that they will be forever lost, and their corruption can spread no further."[br/][br/][recommendedcol]Tip: Declining empire requests does not reduce Empire Favor, diplomatic relations, or reputation.[/recommendedcol]
一位誓约者的预言者找到我们并提出要求：[br/][br/]“情报显示，我们在这个星球上发现了背誓者。为了我们所有人的利益，我们向你提供此任务：杀掉他们，把他们挫骨扬灰，让他们永远消失。这样一来，堕落就不会再扩散下去了。”[br/][br/][recommendedcol]提示：拒绝帝国请求并不会减少帝国好感度、外交关系或声望。[/recommendedcol]
Oathbound refers to the race. Seer refers to a sub-class of oathbound
"Your quest is complete. You have our and the Oracle's thanks" communicates Seer Drozan.
预言者德罗赞发来消息：“你的任务已完成。收下我们和神谕的感谢。”
Oracle refers to a character in Oathbound lore
"They escaped. Your quest remains unresolved." communicates Seer Drozan.
预言者德罗赞发来消息：“他们逃跑了。你没能完成任务。”
将殖民地发展至 {pop}[population/] 人口

An Oathbound Paladin sent the following request:[br/][br/]"A good leader will be able to shape their people's future and help them develop in a mutually beneficial way. Grow one of your colonies, and show us how you do this."[br/][br/][recommendedcol]Tip: Declining empire requests does not reduce Empire Favor, diplomatic relations, or reputation.[/recommendedcol]
一位誓约者帕拉丁发来以下请求：[br/][br/]“优秀的领袖能够塑造子民的未来，并帮助他们以互利的方式发展。发展一个殖民地，向我们展示你的手段。”[br/][br/][recommendedcol]提示：拒绝帝国请求并不会减少帝国好感度、外交关系或声望。[/recommendedcol]
The Paladin congratulates you, saying "You show the heart of a true Paladin. Even the Seers approve of your actions."
帕拉丁向你发来祝贺：“你展现出了一名真正帕拉丁的勇气，就连预言者也认可你的行为。”
The Paladin appears disappointed in his silence.
帕拉丁保持沉默，似乎很失望。
Kill the assigned group of enemies and the spawner they guard
击杀指定敌人群体及其守卫的出生点

A Celestian Light Bringer comes to us with a request:[br/][br/]"Psynumbra filth has infested the world you are conquering. They should be vanquished and destroyed before they are able to enact whatever evil plan they are concocting." [br/][br/][recommendedcol]Tip: Declining empire requests does not reduce Empire Favor, diplomatic relations, or reputation.[/recommendedcol]
一位星神光明使者找到我们并提出请求：[br/][br/]“赛努布拉的污秽已经感染了你正在征服的世界，趁他们还未实施任何精心策划的邪恶计划之前，必须消灭并摧毁他们。”[br/][br/][recommendedcol]提示：拒绝帝国请求并不会减少帝国好感度、外交关系或声望。[/recommendedcol]
Celestian refers to the secret tech. Light Bringer refers to a specific Celestian unit. Psynumbra refers to the secret tech.
"On behalf of everyone in the universe we thank you. No one could predict what would have happened if these fanatics were left alone."
“我谨代表宇宙中的所有人对你表示感谢，没有人能预测如果放任他们不管会带来怎样的结果。”
"No! They escaped! Now it is only a matter of time before their evil will spread across the universe once more... This is on your hands."
“不！他们逃脱了！他们的邪恶将再次蔓延到整个宇宙，只是时间的问题……而这都要算到你的头上。”

A Celestian Light Bringer comes to us with a request:[br/][br/]"We have reason to believe that a new technique is able to cure sickness and injury while increasing the happiness of the receiver. Please test the provided technique and report your findings back to us."[br/][br/][recommendedcol]Tip: Declining empire requests does not reduce Empire Favor, diplomatic relations, or reputation.[/recommendedcol]
一位星神光明使者找到我们并提出请求：[br/][br/]“我们有理由相信，这种新的技术能够治愈疾病和伤害，同时提升患者的幸福度。请测试我们提供的技术并汇报你的发现。”[br/][br/][recommendedcol]提示：拒绝帝国请求并不会减少帝国好感度、外交关系或声望。[/recommendedcol]
"These results are very promising - the subjects are showing positive development. With these results we can continue our own research."
“这些结果很有希望——实验对象出现了良性发展。有了这些结果，我们将能继续我们的研究。”
"No, no, no... This is all wrong. Nevermind our request - we will do it ourselves."
“不，不，不……这完全不对。忘掉我们的请求吧，我们自己来做。”
Reach Friendship or higher relation state with any NPC faction
与任意 NPC 阵营达成“友好”或更高的关系状态

A Celestian Star Guide descends upon us: "These creatures... are lost. You must show them the ways of peace... and prosperity. Commune with them... bring them into the Celestian fold."[br/][br/][recommendedcol]Tip: Declining empire requests does not reduce Empire Favor, diplomatic relations, or reputation.[/recommendedcol]
一位星神星辰向导降临在我们面前：“这些生物……迷失了。你必须向他们展现和平……与繁荣之道。与他们取得联系……让他们与星神交好。”[br/][br/][recommendedcol]提示：拒绝帝国请求并不会减少帝国好感度、外交关系或声望。[/recommendedcol]
The Star Guide and the faction's ambassador hold an extensive sermon for their new clique.
星辰向导和阵营大使为他们新的信徒举行了一次广泛的布道。
The Star Guide holds an uncomfortably long pause before taking their leave.
星辰向导在离开之前令人不安地停顿了很长一段时间。
Kill the assigned group of enemies

A Heritor Lord requests the following of us:[br/][br/]"As long as we have existed we have been hunted by these vile constructs! Now they are looking for us once again. Take them out and rip them apart! Make certain they are never again able to hurt one of us."[br/][br/][recommendedcol]Tip: Declining empire requests does not reduce Empire Favor, diplomatic relations, or reputation.[/recommendedcol]
一位继承者领主向我们提出以下请求：[br/][br/]“自从我们存在以来，就一直被这些邪恶的构造物追杀！现在，他们又在追捕我们了。干掉他们，让他们无法再伤害我们的任何同胞。”[br/][br/][recommendedcol]提示：拒绝帝国请求并不会减少帝国好感度、外交关系或声望。[/recommendedcol]
Heritor refers to the secret tech.
The Heritor Lord left their thanks as they floated out of the room. "The universe is safer without these hunters on the loose."
继承者领主飘出房间时向我们表示了感谢：“没有了这些猎人，宇宙将更加安全。”
The Heritor Lord's anger was palpable "You have doomed us... They will come for us now..."
继承者领主的愤怒溢于言表：“你宣告了我们的终结……现在他们将来追杀我们了……”
Kill the assigned group of enemies and the spawner they guard
击杀指定敌人群体及其守卫的出生点

A Heritor Ambassador requests the following of us:[br/][br/]"A group of Forgotten have been discovered on the planet. They are defectors, corrupt and slanderous! We want to see them taken care of."[br/][br/][recommendedcol]Tip: Declining empire requests does not reduce Empire Favor, diplomatic relations, or reputation.[/recommendedcol]
一位继承者大使向我们提出以下请求：[br/][br/]“我们在这个星球上发现了一群被遗忘者。他们是叛逃者，是堕落和诽谤的代名词！我们希望你能解决他们。”[br/][br/][recommendedcol]提示：拒绝帝国请求并不会减少帝国好感度、外交关系或声望。[/recommendedcol]
Forgotten refers to an npc faction
According to the Ambassador, this planet is now a safer place.
根据大使的说法，这个星球现在更加安全了。
The Ambassador swore that this world is now defiled and it will be their duty to consecrate it.
大使发誓称这个世界已经被玷污了，他们的责任是将其净化。
Es'Teq refers to a concept in Heritor lore

A Heritor Lord requests the following of us:[br/][br/]"We have reason to believe that there are Es'Teq artifacts on the surface. Go, explore the structure and report your findings to us." [br/][br/][recommendedcol]Tip: Declining empire requests does not reduce Empire Favor, diplomatic relations, or reputation.[/recommendedcol]
一位继承者领主向我们提出以下请求：[br/][br/]“我们有理由相信这个星球的表面有埃斯特克神器。去探索这个建筑，并向我们报告你的发现。”[br/][br/][recommendedcol]提示：拒绝帝国请求并不会减少帝国好感度、外交关系或声望。[/recommendedcol]
"We do not take kindly to having our requests ignored."
“我们不能容忍我们的请求被忽视。”
Kill the assigned group of enemies

A Promethean General has stepped up with a request:[br/][br/]"Mutants are like nature saying "This ain't right!", right? So we say kill 'em, burn what's left, and then bury the ashes."[br/][br/][recommendedcol]Tip: Declining empire requests does not reduce Empire Favor, diplomatic relations, or reputation.[/recommendedcol]
一名圣火阵营将军提出请求：[br/][br/]“突变体就像是自然在说‘这样不对！’，不是吗？所以我们要杀了他们，焚烧干净，然后埋葬他们的骨灰。”[br/][br/][recommendedcol]提示：拒绝帝国请求并不会减少帝国好感度、外交关系或声望。[/recommendedcol]
Promethean refers to the secret tech
The General laughed, his men laughed. With their request fulfilled, they were more than happy.
将军和他的手下笑了起来。他们的要求得到了满足，面露愉悦之情。
The General wasn't too happy when he ordered his men to prepare a squad to be ready once the planet is conquered.
将军不太高兴，并命令手下，等到征服了这个星球，就准备一支小队。
Kill the assigned group of enemies and the spawner they guard
击杀指定敌人群体及其守卫的出生点

A hurried looking Promethean Representative has a request for us:[br/][br/]"We have detected signs of a plague forming down on the planet, possibly mutating creatures. Please eradicate as soon as possible."[br/][br/][recommendedcol]Tip: Declining empire requests does not reduce Empire Favor, diplomatic relations, or reputation.[/recommendedcol]
一名神色匆忙的圣火代表向我们提出请求：[br/][br/]“我们发现瘟疫正在这个星球上形成，可能会有生物发生变异。请尽快将其清除。”[br/][br/][recommendedcol]提示：拒绝帝国请求并不会减少帝国好感度、外交关系或声望。[/recommendedcol]
The Promethean Representative calmed down after seeing that you completed the request and went to report to her superiors.
圣火代表在看到你完成了请求后，逐渐平静了下来并向她的上级汇报情况。
Upon news of her request going unfilfilled, the Representative ran out of the room saying "This is terrible news. We need to plan to mitigate a potential long-term infection of the planet..."
那名代表得知她的要求没有得到满足时，跑出房间说道：“这真是个坏消息。我们需要制定计划，减轻这个星球潜在的长期感染……”

A team of Promethean scientists has brought us a request:[br/][br/]"Our instruments show a handful of signals from down on the planet that we can't quite explain. Could you send someone over to check it out? It may prove worthwhile for all of us if you investigate."[br/][br/][recommendedcol]Tip: Declining empire requests does not reduce Empire Favor, diplomatic relations, or reputation.[/recommendedcol]
一个圣火科学家小组向我们提出请求：[br/][br/]“我们的仪器上出现了一些我们无法解释的信号，就在下面的星球上。你能派人去看看吗？花费时间调查对所有人来说也许都是值得的。”[br/][br/][recommendedcol]提示：拒绝帝国请求并不会减少帝国好感度、外交关系或声望。[/recommendedcol]
The Prometheans have been watching intently and thank you as the last signal's origin is resolved.
圣火科学家全神贯注地看着你解析信号的来源，当最后一个信号解析完成后，他们向你表示了感谢。
The Prometheans are quite disappointed to see their request go unfulfilled.
圣火科学家对他们的请求没有得到满足感到非常失望。

The Psynumbra council requests the following:[br/][br/]To put researchers to test their hypothesis on how far a person is willing to go under the influence of hypnosis. Apparently, the more gruesome the outcome, the happier they will be.[br/][br/][recommendedcol]Tip: Declining empire requests does not reduce Empire Favor, diplomatic relations, or reputation.[/recommendedcol]
赛努布拉委员会提出以下请求：[br/][br/]让研究人员测试他们对一个人在催眠的影响下愿意走多远的假说。显然，结果越可怕，他们就越高兴。[br/][br/][recommendedcol]提示：拒绝帝国请求并不会减少帝国好感度、外交关系或声望。[/recommendedcol]
Psynumbra refers to the secret tech.
That seems to have done the trick. Some dark chuckling was accompanied by a note of thanks.
那似乎奏效了。伴随一阵低沉的笑声，赛努布拉委员会发来感谢。
Failure to comply with their request left them angry, to say the least. "The Void waits for no one!" apparently. Whatever that means.
我们没有满足他们的要求似乎使他们非常生气，还说了一些诸如“虚空不会等待任何人！”之类无法理解的话。
Kill the assigned group of enemies

A Psynumbra Representative brings the following request:[br/][br/]"Celestian narcissists have infested the world you are conquering. They should be vanquished and destroyed before they are able to enact whatever plan they are concocting."[br/][br/][recommendedcol]Tip: Declining empire requests does not reduce Empire Favor, diplomatic relations, or reputation.[/recommendedcol]
一位赛努布拉代表提出以下请求：[br/][br/]“星神自恋狂已经感染了你想要征服的世界。趁他们还未实施任何精心策划的邪恶计划之前，必须消灭并摧毁他们。”[br/][br/][recommendedcol]提示：拒绝帝国请求并不会减少帝国好感度、外交关系或声望。[/recommendedcol]
Celestian refers to the secret tech
The Representative left, saying "The Void shall take them, and they shall be taken by the Void." A job well done. Probably.
代表离开时，说道：“虚空将带走他们，他们将被虚空带走。”也许他是想说“干得好”的意思吧。
If the Representative is to be believed you have doomed all of us by letting these "vile, arrogant, worshippers of the light" escape.
那名代表认为，你让那些“邪恶傲慢的光明崇拜者”逃脱的做法等于是给我们所有人都判了死刑。

The Psynumbra delegation requests:[br/][br/]"We would appreciate a show of determination and power. It is really quite simple: raze an enemy's colony and make their people suffer."[br/][br/][recommendedcol]Tip: Declining empire requests does not reduce Empire Favor, diplomatic relations, or reputation.[/recommendedcol]
一名赛努布拉代表提出请求：[br/][br/]“我们希望看见你展现自己的决心和力量。很简单：夷平敌人的殖民地，让他们的人民遭受苦难。”[br/][br/][recommendedcol]提示：拒绝帝国请求并不会减少帝国好感度、外交关系或声望。[/recommendedcol]
The Psynumbra delegation watched with close attention as our troops took the city and destroyed it. She was most pleased.
赛努布拉代表饶有兴趣地看着我们的军队占领并摧毁城市。她非常满意。
"No spine." Were the only words we managed to catch from the delegation before they stormed out of the observation lounge.
“没骨气。”那名代表留下这句话后，便怒气冲冲地离开了观察室。

The Synthesis Ambassador requests:[br/][br/]"To prepare a planet for true colonization, one must build the infrastructure necessary to facilitate large scale automation and AI integration! Please prepare this for us, so we can start our integration as soon as the planet has been conquered." [br/][br/][recommendedcol]Tip: Declining empire requests does not reduce Empire Favor, diplomatic relations, or reputation.[/recommendedcol]
一名合成大使提出请求：[br/][br/]“为了让星球实现真正的殖民化，就必须建立必要的基础设施来促进大规模的自动化和 AI 集成！请帮助我们做好准备，等征服了这个星球，我们就可以开始集成工作了。”[br/][br/][recommendedcol]提示：拒绝帝国请求并不会减少帝国好感度、外交关系或声望。[/recommendedcol]
Synthesis refers to the secret tech.
That seemed to do the trick. The Synthesis Ambassador just walked in and congratulated you on the high quality fibre optic cable you put down.
那似乎奏效了。合成大使走进来并对你安装的高质量光缆表示祝贺。
We received two- no four-... We received about 25,000 messages from the Synthesis. They may not be happy about their request going unfulfilled.
我们收到了合成阵营发来的两条——不，是四条……更正，是大约两万五千条消息，也许是因为他们的要求没有得到实现而感到不满。
Donate the specified amount of Energy

The Synthesis group requests the following:[br/][br/]A large amount of energy, claiming that running their 'simulations' takes a lot of it. Further questioning reveals that they are simulating a new kind of AI which, according to them, could be a "great asset to the empire".[br/][br/][recommendedcol]Tip: Declining empire requests does not reduce Empire Favor, diplomatic relations, or reputation.[/recommendedcol]
一个合成组织提出以下请求：[br/][br/]他们需要大量能量，因为运行他们的“模拟”需要消耗大量能量。通过进一步的询问，我们得知他们正在模拟一种新型人工智能。据他们所说，那可能是“帝国的伟大资产”。[br/][br/][recommendedcol]提示：拒绝帝国请求并不会减少帝国好感度、外交关系或声望。[/recommendedcol]
We got word that the energy we provided was just about enough to run their simulation. Whether or not they succeeded remains to be seen.
我们得到消息称，我们提供的能量刚好足够运行他们的模拟，但他们能否取得成功还有待观察。
Some sort of hacker-speak message was received just now. It appears they are not happy with being ignored in this request.
我们刚才收到了某种黑客信息，他们似乎对自己的请求被忽视而感到不满。
"Deploy Monitor" refers to an in-game operation

A Synthesis ambassador requests:[br/][br/]To uncover as much of the planet below as possible, specifically by using monitoring stations to assess their efficiency.[br/][br/][recommendedcol]Tip: Declining empire requests does not reduce Empire Favor, diplomatic relations, or reputation.[/recommendedcol]
合成大使请求：[br/][br/]尽可能多地探索下方的星球，尤其是要通过使用监测站来评估其效率。[br/][br/][recommendedcol]提示：拒绝帝国请求并不会减少帝国好感度、外交关系或声望。[/recommendedcol]
Happy with the efficiency of the monitoring stations, the Synthesis ambassador thanks you for fulfilling his request.
合成大使对监测站的效率感到满意，并感谢你完成了他的请求。
Leaving the request unfulfilled had the ambassador disappointed.
请求未得到实现，大使感到十分失望。

The Voidtech research division requests:[br/][br/]"We request you check out the following coordinates on the planet's surface. Anomalous readings have been detected." Considering what they consider anomalous, this may be worthwhile.[br/][br/][recommendedcol]Tip: Declining empire requests does not reduce Empire Favor, diplomatic relations, or reputation.[/recommendedcol]
虚空科技研究部门提出请求：[br/][br/]“我们希望你能前往星球的以下坐标进行调查，我们在那里检测到了异常读数。”考虑到他们认为的异常，这也许值得前去查看一番。[br/][br/][recommendedcol]提示：拒绝帝国请求并不会减少帝国好感度、外交关系或声望。[/recommendedcol]
Voidtech refers to the secret tech
"Yes, we are now aware that these readings were a fault in our detection system. Apologies." reads the memo that just arrived.
“是的，我们现在意识到这些异常读数其实是检测系统故障造成的。抱歉。”刚刚收到的备忘录上写道。
We just received a memo that reads. "Readings were a fault in our detection system. Better to check them regardless. Rather safe than sorry." How rude.
我们刚刚收到了一份备忘录，上面写着：“异常读数由检测系统故障造成，但不管怎样最好还是去检查一下。小心驶得万年船。”真是粗鲁。

The lead Voidtech researcher has requested that:[br/][br/]"It'd be great if you put the best scientific minds at your disposal to try and solve this very important equation. Even our best minds could not crack it, but we are certain it would revolutionize Teleportation as we know it."[br/][br/][recommendedcol]Tip: Declining empire requests does not reduce Empire Favor, diplomatic relations, or reputation.[/recommendedcol]
虚空科技首席研究员提出请求：[br/][br/]“如果你能派最优秀的科学家来解决这个非常重要的方程，那就太好了。我们中最聪明的家伙也无法破解它，但我们可以肯定的是，它将对我们熟知的传送技术带来彻底的变革。”[br/][br/][recommendedcol]提示：拒绝帝国请求并不会减少帝国好感度、外交关系或声望。[/recommendedcol]
19? What does it mean? The Voidtech scientist just laughed.
19？这是什么意思？那名虚空科技科学家只是笑了笑。
A little disappointed, but seemingly still amused, the Voidtech scientist passed a note reading "19". What does it mean?
那名虚空科技科学家有点失望，但似乎还是觉得很有趣。他递过来一张写着“19”的纸条。这是什么意思？
星球边际，我们有麻烦了。
Kill the assigned group of enemies

One of the Voidtech scientists came to us with a request:[br/][br/]"We may or may not have made a little mistake. Long story short, a teleportation experiment went wrong and an eclectic group of angry, deadly people and creatures has been teleported down to the planet. Could you... take care of them for us?"[br/][br/][recommendedcol]Tip: Declining empire requests does not reduce Empire Favor, diplomatic relations, or reputation.[/recommendedcol]
一位虚空科技科学家找到我们并提出请求：[br/][br/]“我们可能犯了一个很小的错误，也许还称不上是错误。长话短说，我们的一次传送实验出了差错，一群愤怒而危险的人类和生物被传送到了这个星球上。你能帮我们……解决掉他们吗？”[br/][br/][recommendedcol]提示：拒绝帝国请求并不会减少帝国好感度、外交关系或声望。[/recommendedcol]
"We knew you could do it!" said the scientist who looked very unsure of whether or not you could do it.
“我们就知道你能做到！”那位科学家说道，但他看起来却十分不确定你能否做到。
"This is not good. Very, very not good. It's terrible, in fact..." The scientist ran out to report to his superiors.
“这不对劲。非常，非常不对劲。实际上，这很糟糕……”那位科学家跑了出去并向他的上级报告。

The head Xenoplague researcher asks us:[br/][br/]"Could you construct a lab for us? Once this planet has been colonized properly, it is important we be able to get to work straight away! There are very promising signs already, and it would be a waste if had to spend time setting things up ourselves."[br/][br/][recommendedcol]Tip: Declining empire requests does not reduce Empire Favor, diplomatic relations, or reputation.[/recommendedcol]
一位异星疫病首席研究员向我们提出请求：[br/][br/]“你能给我们建一座实验室吗？等这个星球顺利完成殖民后，我们就可以立刻开始工作了。这很重要！我们发现了一些很有价值的迹象，如果到时候还要花时间来做准备的话，那就是在浪费资源。”[br/][br/][recommendedcol]提示：拒绝帝国请求并不会减少帝国好感度、外交关系或声望。[/recommendedcol]
Xenoplague refers to the secret tech
The head researcher sends her regards, saying that with this laboratory they will be able to get to work as soon and the planet is yours.
首席研究员发来问候，他们称只要有了这个实验室，等你征服这个星球后，他们就可以立刻开始工作了。
"It is such an interesting planet; why would you have us waste time with menial labor?" - Head Xenoplague researcher.
“这是一个非常有趣的星球；你为什么要让我们浪费时间去做那些卑微的劳动？”——异星疫病首席研究员。
Kill the assigned group of enemies and the spawner they guard
击杀指定敌人群体及其守卫的出生点

The Xenoplague delegation has asked the following:[br/][br/]To check out what they are reportedly calling "disturbing signs of destruction" down on the planet. It appears that a site they have their eyes on is in the process of being destroyed.[br/][br/][recommendedcol]Tip: Declining empire requests does not reduce Empire Favor, diplomatic relations, or reputation.[/recommendedcol]
一个异星疫病代表团提出以下请求：[br/][br/]调查星球上他们口中所谓的“令人不安的破坏迹象”。似乎是他们关注的一个地点正在遭受摧毁。[br/][br/][recommendedcol]提示：拒绝帝国请求并不会减少帝国好感度、外交关系或声望。[/recommendedcol]
A relieved delegation sends their regards to you.
如释重负的代表团向你发来问候。
A disappointed delegation says they will have to go looking for a different location now.
失望的代表团称他们现在不得不去寻找另一个地方。

A Xenoplague Ambassador requests:[br/][br/]"Could you research the following coordinates? We have reason to believe this location may be of value to our research." [br/][br/][recommendedcol]Tip: Declining empire requests does not reduce Empire Favor, diplomatic relations, or reputation.[/recommendedcol]
一位异星疫病大使提出请求：[br/][br/]“你能研究一下这些坐标吗？我们有理由相信，这个位置可能对我们的研究很有价值。”[br/][br/][recommendedcol]提示：拒绝帝国请求并不会减少帝国好感度、外交关系或声望。[/recommendedcol]
"We thank you for your time. It is unfortunate the search did not turn up any interesting results."
“谢谢你能抽出时间来。不幸的是，搜索没有得到任何有用的结果。”
The Ambassador lets us know he is disappointed we wasted his time.
那位大使称我们浪费了他的时间，并表示很失望。
Move given Prospector from HQ to target mountain hex
将获得的勘探者从总部移动至目标山地单元格

A Dvar beneficiary has a request for us:[br/][br/]"My Consortium has been given clearance from the Adamant Council to do business on this planet. Readings show that this sector holds a vast amount of valuable minerals. We have provided you with our special charges to bring to this location."[br/][br/][recommendedcol]Tip: Declining empire requests does not reduce Empire Favor, diplomatic relations, or reputation.[/recommendedcol]
一名矮人受益人向我们提出请求：[br/][br/]“我的财团已经得到了坚毅委员会的许可，可以在这个星球上开展业务。数据显示，这片区域蕴藏大量珍贵矿产。我们已经给你提供了需要带至这个位置的特殊炸药。”[br/][br/][recommendedcol]提示：拒绝帝国请求并不会减少帝国好感度、外交关系或声望。[/recommendedcol]
Consortia is the plural of Consortium
"Excellent. You have our consortium's gratitude. Now make way for our Prospectors immediately."
“太好了。财团对你表示感谢。现在请为我们的勘探者开路吧。”
"Fine. Our disappointment is unprecedented. We'll leave someone else in charge."
“我们感受到了前所未有的失望。既然如此，我们会让其他人来负责。”
Place mining charges for the Dvar beneficiary.
为矮人受益人放置采矿炸弹。
Absorb a new Colony or Outpost
吸收一个新的殖民地或前哨

An Oathbound Paladin sent the following request: "A good leader will be able to shape their people's future and help them develop in a mutually beneficial way. Grow one of your colonies to its maximum size, and show us how you do this."[br/][br/][recommendedcol]Tip: Declining empire requests does not reduce Empire Favor, diplomatic relations, or reputation.[/recommendedcol]
一位誓约者帕拉丁发来以下请求：“优秀的领袖能够塑造子民的未来，并帮助他们以互利的方式发展。将一个殖民地发展至最大规模，向我们展示你的手段。”[br/][br/][recommendedcol]提示：拒绝帝国请求并不会减少帝国好感度、外交关系或声望。[/recommendedcol]
Paladin refers to a sub-class of Oathbound
The Paladin dismounted his enormous Exemplar. With open arms and warm words, he welcomed the new folk.
那名帕拉丁从他巨大的楷模机甲上走了下来。他张开双臂，口中说着热情的言辞，欢迎新来的人们。
Only a slight twitch in his eye betrayed the Paladin's contempt. "I see," he said smiling, "they might misunderstand."
那名帕拉丁眼神轻微的抽动暴露了他的蔑视。“我明白了，”他笑着说道，“他们可能无法理解。”
